title: 服务器bat无法正常启动
txt_content: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: Option UseConcMarkSweepGC was deprecated in version 9.0 and will likely be removed in a future release. Loading libraries, please wait... [21:27:24 INFO]: Starting minecraft server version 1.12.2 [21:27:24 INFO]: Loading properties [21:27:24 INFO]: Default game type: ADVENTURE [21:27:24 INFO]: This server is running Paper version git-Paper-1562 (MC: 1.12.2) (Implementing API version 1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT) [21:27:24 INFO]: Debug logging is disabled [21:27:24 INFO]: Server Ping Player Sample Count: 12 [21:27:24 INFO]: Using 4 threads for Netty based IO [21:27:24 INFO]: Generating keypair [21:27:25 INFO]: Starting Minecraft server on *:26781 [21:27:25 INFO]: Using default channel type [21:27:25 INFO]: Set PluginClassLoader as parallel capable > WARNING: An illegal reflective access operation has occurred WARNING: Illegal reflective access by com.intellectualcrafters.plot.config.Config (file:/C:/Users/Mloong/Desktop/新建文 件夹/plugins/%5B地皮%5DPlotSquared.jar) to field java.lang.reflect.Field.modifiers WARNING: Please consider reporting this to the maintainers of com.intellectualcrafters.plot.config.Config WARNING: Use --illegal-access=warn to enable warnings of further illegal reflective access operations WARNING: All illegal access operations will be denied in a future release 2019-05-13 21:27:28,855 Thread-1 WARN [AsyncContext@6a6824be] Ignoring log event after log4j was shut down. 2019-05-13 21:27:33,002 Thread-1 WARN Ignoring log event after log4j was shut down服务器bat无法启动求助

replies.author: xinyang0326
replies.txt_content:
bat参数有问题，请先把java9将为8重新写以下核心参数
Java -Xincgc -Xms[你的内存大小]M -XX:MaxPermSize=128M -Dfml.ignorePatchDiscrepancies=true -jar [你的核心文件名]  -nojline复制代码

replies.author: Willam_Che
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: MC_tingfeng
replies.txt_content: 地皮插件报错，检查一下你的地皮插件的配置文件
